Tool.Title: Microsoft Office Word Version Extraction Tool

Issue.Title: Document Timed Out
Issue.Description: The extraction of versions for this Word document timed out.

Issue.Title: No Versions Detected
Issue.Description: Although this Word document was flagged as having versions, Word found no versions.

Issue.Title: Version Count Failure
Issue.Description: An error occurred while accessing the version count of this Word document.

Issue.Title: Version Save Failure
Issue.Description: A particular version from this Word document failed to save as a new Word document.

Issue.Title: Version Open Failure
Issue.Description: A particular version from this Word document could not be opened.

Issue.Title: Version Access Failure
Issue.Description: A particular version from this Word document could not be accessed.

Issue.Title: Directory Create Failure
Issue.Description: Could not create a directory to hold versions for this Word document.

Issue.Title: Directory Delete Failure
Issue.Description: Could not delete previous instance of the folder which holds extracted versions for the given Word document.

Issue.Title: Document Open Failure
Issue.Description: Word failed to open this document.
